h1: How Many Calories in Half a Watermelon?
assumptions: Edible red flesh only, seedless variety; average whole watermelon ~4 kg edible portion, so half ≈ 2 kg.
disclaimer: Nutrition varies by watermelon size, variety, ripeness, and portion (rind removed); values are approximate. Check fresh produce info when available.

quick_answer.text: Half a whole watermelon (≈2 kg edible flesh) provides about 600 kcal, mostly from natural sugars.

label_note: Totals mirror Nutrition Facts fields for easy comparison.

faqs.q: How many calories in half a watermelon?
faqs.a: Approximately 600 kcal for half of an average 4 kg edible whole watermelon.

faqs.q: What are the carbs in 1/2 of a whole watermelon?
faqs.a: About 152 g carbs, including 124 g sugars and 8 g fiber.

faqs.q: Is watermelon low calorie for its size?
faqs.a: Yes, only 30 kcal per 100 g due to high water content (92%).

faqs.q: How much protein or fat in half a watermelon?
faqs.a: Low: 12 g protein and 4 g fat total.

faqs.q: Does watermelon size affect calorie count?
faqs.a: Yes; larger watermelons mean more calories per half—adjust based on actual weight.
